Summary: A black disc shape with red lights around the outer edge and one red light in the center.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was just starting to go to bed for school one night. I don't remember what year or month. I was lying in bed looking out my bedroom window and had just covered up when I saw something large with red lights outside. My first thought was of the U.F.O. I had seen several years prior. I knew this wasn't a common experience and was freaked out by now possibly seeing a second one. I once again ran out the back door and this time into the yard. What I saw was a black or darkened disc shaped object moving once again in a southeastern direction. It had one ring of red lights around the outer edge and one red light in the dead center of the underside. It was only the underside I could see of the craft. It was rotating and moving at a good speed. Visually it was about an inch and a half wide. The object made on sound. It passed behind the same trees in my backyard and I lost sight of it. I came back in and told my dad I'd seen another U.F.O. He seemed a bit less skeptical, but there wasn't much to be done. I went back to bed and hoped not to have nightmares. Other than that, I suffered no changes.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around November 30th 1988
